description: Gets a graph summary for an RDF graph. When invoking this operation in a Neptune cluster that has IAM authentication enabled, the IAM user or role making the request must have a policy attached that allows the neptune-db:GetGraphSummary IAM action in that cluster.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The HTTP return code of the request. If the request succeeded, the code is 200.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of this graph summary response.

nested_items.name: lastStatisticsComputationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp, in ISO 8601 format, of the time at which Neptune last computed statistics.

nested_items.name: graphSummary
nested_items.description: The graph summary of an RDF graph. See Graph summary response for an RDF graph.

nested_items.name: numDistinctSubjects
nested_items.description: The number of distinct subjects in the graph.

nested_items.name: numDistinctPredicates
nested_items.description: The number of distinct predicates in the graph.

nested_items.name: numQuads
nested_items.description: The number of quads in the graph.

nested_items.name: numClasses
nested_items.description: The number of classes in the graph.

nested_items.name: classes
nested_items.description: A list of the classes in the graph.

nested_items.name: predicates
nested_items.description: 'A list of predicates in the graph, along with the predicate counts.

nested_items.name: subjectStructures
nested_items.description: This field is only present when the request mode is DETAILED. It contains a list of subject structures.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: Number of occurrences of this specific structure.

nested_items.name: predicates
nested_items.description: A list of predicates present in this specific structure.
